video.title: The Originals
video.synopsis: The Mikaelsons move to New Orleans and form an alliance with local witches in an effort to rule the city once again in this "Vampire Diaries" spinoff.

episodes.synopsis: After centuries away, vampire-werewolf hybrid Klaus returns to the French Quarter of New Orleans to find it taken over by his former protégé, Marcel.
episodes.title: Always and Forever

episodes.synopsis: When Rebekah arrives in New Orleans at her brother Elijah's request, she worries that Klaus is up to no good and asks Sophie for help.
episodes.title: House of the Rising Son

episodes.synopsis: With the help of a reluctant Sophie, Klaus and Rebekah join forces to bring down Marcel's empire from within, despite Elijah's concerns.
episodes.title: Tangled Up in Blue

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah is determined to get to the bottom of a strange encounter with Elijah, while Marcel lets Davina out for a night at the music festival.
episodes.title: Girl in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Sophie reveals troubling secrets from her past, and Marcel asks Klaus to accompany him to the bayou after gruesome remains are discovered.
episodes.title: Sinners and Saints

episodes.synopsis: Klaus takes extreme measures to protect Hayley and their unborn child while Marcel seeks advice from an old friend and Davina works on her magic.
episodes.title: Fruit of the Poisoned Tree

episodes.synopsis: Despite their growing tensions, Klaus and Elijah seek Sabine's help to find a missing Hayley, while Marcel approaches Rebekah with an enticing offer.
episodes.title: Bloodletting

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah turns to Father Kieran for guidance, Elijah is troubled by his falling out with Klaus, and Marcel uncovers disturbing information.
episodes.title: The River in Reverse

episodes.synopsis: Cami is disturbed by what she learns of Klaus's past, while Hayley, Elijah and Rebekah investigate a plan to harm werewolves in the bayou.
episodes.title: Reigning Pain in New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Elijah and Marcel form an unlikely alliance as Klaus takes steps to get Davina back, and Hayley is forced to make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: The Casket Girls

episodes.synopsis: Sophie approaches the others with some startling information about the Harvest Festival and presents a plan to save Davina, who is violently ill.
episodes.title: Après Moi, Le Déluge

episodes.synopsis: Marcel refuses to help Klaus when a gruesome discovery is made, and Rebekah recognizes the remnants of a sacrifice as the work of a dangerous warlock.
episodes.title: Dance Back from the Grave

episodes.synopsis: Father Kieran has a run-in with a witch from his past, while someone from Rebekah and Marcel's past threatens to expose their long-buried secrets.
episodes.title: Crescent City

episodes.synopsis: Rebekah is locked up in the sanatorium and discovers a revenge-seeking witch is back, and Elijah makes a decision that endangers Klaus and Rebekah.
episodes.title: Long Way Back from Hell

episodes.synopsis: Back in 1919, Klaus reveals details of a devastating secret, Elijah and Monique form an alliance, and Marcel and Rebekah scheme against the witches.
episodes.title: Le Grand Guignol

episodes.synopsis: Tensions build between Klaus, Elijah and Rebekah when they are trapped together in the City of the Dead cemetery by a witch's spell.
episodes.title: Farewell to Storyville

episodes.synopsis: Elijah makes a power-grabbing move after accusing Klaus of inaction, and the Mikaelsons throw an extravagant party in an attempt to bring peace.
episodes.title: Moon over Bourbon Street

episodes.synopsis: Elijah focuses on restoring the family home to its former glory, angering Klaus, who sets a new plan in motion using a werewolf from his own line.
episodes.title: The Big Uneasy

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah disagree about how to handle the Crescent Wolves, and a violent explosion in the bayou deepens the divide between the communities.
episodes.title: An Unblinking Death

episodes.synopsis: Hayley confronts a surprising enemy as she and her unborn baby fall into peril during a celebratory wake to honor a fallen member of the community.
episodes.title: A Closer Walk with Thee

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah enact a plan to change the fates of Hayley and the werewolf community, forcing Marcel to rally an army to regain control of the city.
episodes.title: The Battle of New Orleans

episodes.synopsis: Klaus and Elijah search for Hayley as her due date nears, while Francesca meets with Oliver and Jackson about the werewolves' future in New Orleans.
episodes.title: From a Cradle to a Grave
